game.name: MoonLost
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Color Alternatives, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: An old-style shooter with adventure mechanics and a nostalgic environment, ready to make you feel stimulated for fighting strange creatures and comfortable while exploring a fantasy reality. You'll deal with shooting ostile creatures, meditating and find meaning of ancient books to manage stats.
